text: Says North Korea has "agreed to denuclearization."
"James Comey Memos just out and show clearly that there was NO COLLUSION and NO OBSTRUCTION"
EPA administrator Scott Pruitt's short-term rental "was about market rate."
Says Scott Pruitt’s security spending was "somewhat more" than his predecessor.

"This will be the last time — April — that you’re going to (fill out) that old-fashioned, big, lots of pages, complicated tax form. Because next April you’re going to, in many cases, (file) one page, one card. It’s going to be very, very different. Very, very different."

"In many places, like California, the same person votes many times. You probably heard about that. They always like to say 'oh that's a conspiracy theory.' Not a conspiracy theory, folks. Millions and millions of people."
"We’ve started building the wall."
Mexico has "very strong border laws -- ours are pathetic."
"Only fools, or worse, are saying that our money losing Post Office makes money with Amazon. THEY LOSE A FORTUNE, and this will be changed."
"Last year we lost $500 billion on trade with China."
In Japan, "they take a bowling ball from 20 feet up in the air and they drop it on the hood of the car. And if the hood dents, then the car doesn't qualify...It's horrible, the way we're treated."
"We do have a Trade Deficit with Canada, as we do with almost all countries (some of them massive)."
"When I was campaigning, I was talking about 18 and 20 years (when) wages effectively went down. Now, for the first time in a long time, they're starting to go up for people."
"Democrats are nowhere to be found on DACA."
"You take Pulse nightclub. If you had one person in that room that could carry a gun and knew how to use it, it wouldn’t have happened, or certainly to the extent that it did."
"I have been much tougher on Russia than Obama, just look at the facts. Total Fake News!"
"I never said Russia did not meddle in the election."
"The Democrats are pushing for Universal HealthCare while thousands of people are marching in the UK because their U system is going broke and not working."

At the State of the Union address, Democrats, "even on positive news … were like death and un-American. Un-American. Somebody said, ‘treasonous.’ I mean, yeah, I guess, why not? Can we call that treason? Why not?"
"Instead of two for one, we have cut 22 burdensome regulations for everyone new rule."
"45.6 million people watched (the State of the Union), the highest number in history. @FoxNews beat every other Network, for the first time ever, with 11.7 million people tuning in."
"A single immigrant can bring in unlimited numbers of distant relatives."

"In the past, we have foolishly released hundreds and hundreds of dangerous terrorists, only to meet them again on the battlefield — including the ISIS leader, al-Baghdadi, who we captured, who we had, who we released."
"We are now, very proudly, an exporter of energy to the world."
"After years of wage stagnation, we are finally seeing rising wages."
The immigration visa lottery "randomly hands out green cards without any regard for skill, merit, or the safety of American people."
"We enacted the biggest tax cuts and reforms in American history."
"The ice caps were going to melt, they were going to be gone by now, but now they’re setting records, so okay, they’re at a record level."
Says "22 to 24 people" came into the United States due to family connection with suspect in the October 2017 New York City terror attack.
Mexico is "now rated the number one most dangerous country in the world."
In a government shutdown, "what they are really doing is shutting down our military."
Says the Obama administration "sold perhaps the best located and finest embassy in London ... only to build a new one in an off location for 1.2 billion dollars."
When President Barack Obama "signed the executive order (on DACA, he) actually said he doesn't have the right to do this."
"I authorized Zero access to White House (actually turned him down many times) for author of phony book! I never spoke to him for book."
There is "substantial evidence of voter fraud."
The new tax law is "kicking the American economy into high gear with $5.5 trillion in tax cuts."
The Senate seat won in a special election by a Democrat had been "held for more than thirty years by Republicans."
"We have signed more legislation than anybody. We broke the record of Harry Truman."
"We essentially repealed Obamacare because we got rid of the individual mandate ... and that was a primary source of funding of Obamacare."
Says of the diversity visa lottery program, "they give us their worst people, they put them in a bin," and "the worst of the worst" are selected.
"Black homeownership just hit the highest level it has ever been in the history of our country."
"Hillary Clinton lied many times to the FBI."
Says the tax bill "is going to cost me a fortune, this thing -- believe me. Believe me, this is not good for me."
"For years, they have not been able to get tax cuts -- many, many years, since Reagan."
Says Joe Scarborough is party to an "unsolved mystery" from his time as a congressman in Florida.
Says Alabama Senate candidate Doug Jones "wants to raise taxes."
Chicago is "the city with the strongest gun laws in our nation."
Says the diversity visa lottery program is "a Chuck Schumer beauty."
Says Paul Manafort’s alleged crimes were "years ago, before Paul Manafort was part of the Trump campaign."
Says the GOP plan he supports is "the biggest tax cut in U.S. history."
Insurance companies "have made a fortune with Obamacare."
"We're the highest developed nation taxed in the world."
"The cost-sharing reductions (were) a gift (that) they gave the insurance companies."
The Obama administration "borrowed more than $10 trillion, right? And yet, we picked up $5.2 trillion just in the stock market. ... Maybe in a sense we’re reducing debt."
"Bob Corker gave us the Iran Deal."
"Loopholes in current law prevent ‘Unaccompanied Alien Children’ (UACs) that arrive in the country illegally from being removed."
In the Alabama Senate runoff, "the candidate I endorsed (Luther Strange) went up MANY points after endorsement!"
Says "No, I don't benefit, I don't benefit" from his tax proposal.
Ending the estate tax would "protect millions of small businesses and the American farmer."
"We have one senator who’s a ‘yes’ vote ... but he’s in the hospital. And he’s a ‘yes’ vote. So we can’t do it by Friday. So we have the votes" to pass a health care bill.
"NFL attendance and ratings are WAY DOWN. Boring games yes, but many stay away because they love our country."
The Graham-Cassidy health care bill does "include coverage of pre-existing conditions."
"We stopped traffic coming through -- 78 percent."
"We have become an energy exporter for the first time ever just recently."
"There aren't too many people outside protesting" his speech at the Phoenix Convention Center.
White nationalist protesters in Charlottesville "had a permit. The other group didn’t have a permit."
"Study what General Pershing of the United States did to terrorists when caught. There was no more Radical Islamic Terror for 35 years!"
Wages "haven’t gone up for a long time."
"My first order as president was to renovate and modernize our nuclear arsenal. It is now far stronger and more powerful than ever before."

Untaxed corporate earnings used to be "$2.5 trillion … I guess it’s $5 trillion now. Whatever it is, it’s a lot more. So we have anywhere from 4 (trillion) to 5 or even more trillions of dollars sitting offshore."
"The border is down 78 percent. Under past administrations, the border didn’t go down -- it went up."
"Business spirit is the highest it's ever been, according to polls."
"We've achieved a historic increase in defense spending to get our troops the support they so richly deserve."
Amazon has a "no-tax monopoly."
"The person in charge of the Hillary investigation, Andrew McCabe, got $700,000 from (Hillary Clinton) for wife!"
During the Nixon Watergate investigation, "out of courtesy, the FBI started reporting to the Department of Justice. But there was nothing official."

"I've gotten rid of the Johnson Amendment … I signed an executive order so that now ... ministers and and preachers and rabbis and whoever it may be, they can speak. You know, you couldn’t speak politically before, now you can."
Says his job approval poll numbers are "not bad" relative to other presidents at this point in his presidency.
Says John Podesta "refused to give the DNC server to the FBI and the CIA. Disgraceful!"
Says Barack Obama found out about Russia "in August. Now, the election was in November. That's a lot of time. He did nothing about it."
"Gas prices are the lowest in the U.S. in over ten years!"
CNN’s ratings are "way down."
"We're pretty much at the 50 percent mark" on deportations of MS-13 gang members.
"I can say that the people that have been hired (for the independent Russia investigation) are all Hillary Clinton supporters, some of them worked for Hillary Clinton."
Obamacare has led to fewer health insurance options for millions of Americans.
"The new Rasmussen Poll, one of the most accurate in the 2016 Election, just out with a Trump 50% Approval Rating. That's higher than O's #'s!"
"Two million more people just dropped out of Obamacare. It is in a death spiral."
Rare is the president "who's passed more legislation, who's done more things than what we've done, between the executive orders and the job-killing regulations that have been terminated."
"China will be allowed to build hundreds of additional coal plants. So we can’t build the plants, but they can, according to this (Paris) agreement."
"At least 7 dead and 48 wounded in terror attack and Mayor of London says there is ‘no reason to be alarmed!’ "
Deals struck on his first foreign trip as president made and saved "millions of jobs."
Says James Clapper "and virtually everyone else" said "there is no collusion" in the Russia investigation findings.
"This Russia thing with Trump and Russia is a made-up story. It's an excuse by the Democrats for having lost an election that they should've won."
"Dems want billions to go to Insurance Companies to bail out donors"
"The U.S. recorded its slowest economic growth in five years (2016). GDP up only 1.6%. Trade deficits hurt the economy very badly."
"Back when they did NATO, there was no such thing as terrorism."
"No administration has accomplished more in the first 90 days."
"I have not called for impeachment" of President Donald Trump.
"The weak illegal immigration policies of the Obama Admin. allowed bad MS 13 gangs to form in cities across U.S. We are removing them fast!"
On whether NATO is "obsolete."
Before the presidential campaign, "I didn't know Steve (Bannon)."
"There was a very large infrastructure bill that was approved during the Obama administration, a trillion dollars. Nobody ever saw anything being built."
"When you look for a job, you can't find it and you give up. You are now considered statistically employed."
"The NSA and FBI tell Congress that Russia did not influence electoral process."
"Germany owes ... vast sums of money to NATO & the United States must be paid more for the powerful, and very expensive, defense it provides to Germany!"
Says "the New York Times wrote about" Barack Obama wiretapping Donald Trump during the election.
"122 vicious prisoners, released by the Obama Administration from Gitmo, have returned to the battlefield."
"According to data provided by the Department of Justice, the vast majority of individuals convicted of terrorism and terrorism-related offenses since 9/11 came here from outside of our country."
Says his budget "calls for one of the largest increases in national defense spending in American history."
"The National Debt in my first month went down by $12 billion."
"Look at what’s happening last night in Sweden. Sweden, who would believe this? Sweden. They took in large numbers. They’re having problems like they never thought possible."
The media has "a lower approval rate than Congress."
On leaks and the release of secret information.
"While on FAKE NEWS @CNN, Bernie Sanders was cut off for using the term fake news to describe the network. They said technical difficulties!"
Says CNN’s Chris Cuomo "never asked" Sen. Richard Blumenthal about Blumenthal's misstatements on his own service in Vietnam.
"The murder rate in our country is the highest it’s been in 47 years."
"Smart! 'Kuwait issues its own Trump-esque visa ban for five Muslim-majority countries.' "
Terrorism and terrorist attacks in the United States and Europe have "gotten to a point where it's not even being reported."
Says "109 people out of hundreds of thousands of travelers" were affected by the immigration executive order.
"My policy is similar to what President Obama did in 2011 when he banned visas for refugees from Iraq for six months."
"If you were a Muslim, you could come in, if you were a Christian, it was impossible."
Says ICE and border patrol officers "unanimously endorsed me for president."
"In our nation’s capital, killings have risen by 50 percent."
"The media ... sort of made it sound like I had a feud with the intelligence community."
"That was the largest audience to witness an inauguration, period."
"We've made other countries rich while the wealth ... of our country has dissipated over the horizon."
The inauguration of Donald Trump "will be the first one that I miss since I've been in Congress."
Says Georgia’s 5th congressional district, represented by John Lewis, is "in horrible shape and falling apart (not to mention crime infested)."
Says Georgia’s 5th congressional district, represented by John Lewis, is "in horrible shape and falling apart (not to mention crime infested)."
Americans don't "care at all" about Donald Trump's tax returns.
Activities by foreign governments had "absolutely no effect on the outcome of this election."
"If Russia, or some other entity, was hacking, why did the White House wait so long to act? Why did they only complain after Hillary lost?"
"We had a massive landslide victory, as you know, in the Electoral College."
Says he "won the popular vote if you deduct the millions of people who voted illegally."
"The @nytimes sent a letter to their subscribers apologizing for their BAD coverage of me."
"The @nytimes states today that DJT believes ‘more countries should acquire nuclear weapons.’ How dishonest are they. I never said this!"
Says "thousands" at a Manhattan rally for Donald Trump were chanting "We hate Muslims, we hate blacks, we want our great country back."
"Beyonce and Jay Z, I like them, I like them ... I get bigger crowds than they do. It's true. I get far bigger crowds."
Says that at a campaign rally President Barack Obama "spent so much time screaming at a protester, and frankly it was a disgrace."
"I have tremendous support from women."
The media "never show crowds."
"In many instances, (people's) health care costs are more than their mortgage costs or their rent, which, by the way, is a first in American history."
"Twitter, Google and Facebook are burying the FBI criminal investigation of Clinton. Very dishonest media!"

Says Hillary Clinton "wants to let people just pour in. You could have 650 million people pour in and we do nothing about it. Think of it. That’s what could happen. You triple the size of our country in one week."
"The man who was in charge of the investigation of Hillary Clinton accepted essentially from Hillary Clinton $675,000 that went to his wife."
"Wikileaks also shows how John Podesta rigged the polls by oversampling Democrats, a voter suppression technique."
"14 percent of noncitizens are registered to vote."
The stories from women saying he groped or forced himself on them "largely have been debunked."
Says Hillary Clinton is "wrong" to say he mocked a disabled reporter.
When Hillary Clinton "ran the State Department, $6 billion was missing. How do you miss $6 billion? You ran the State Department, $6 billion was either stolen — they don't know."
Says Hillary Clinton's "plan is going to raise taxes and even double your taxes."
Says Hillary Clinton "wants to have open borders."

"Back in the Great Recession, when millions of  jobs across America hung in the balance, Donald Trump said rescuing the auto industry didn’t really matter very much. He said, and I quote again, ‘Let it go.’ "
"Many of (Hillary Clinton's) friends took bigger deductions (than me). Warren Buffett took a massive deduction. (George) Soros, who is a friend of hers, took a massive deduction."
Says Hillary Clinton was "let off the hook" for her email scandal while Gen. David Petraeus had his life "destroyed for doing far, far less."
"Of course, there is large scale voter fraud happening on and before election day."
"Workers in the United States are making less than they were almost 20 years ago, and yet they are working harder."
"We don't have any" chess grandmasters in the United States.
Says Libya "Ambassador (Christopher) Stevens sent 600 requests for help" in Benghazi.
Says "I’ve been proven right" about "Hillary Clinton's radical call for open borders, meaning anyone in the world can enter the United States without any limit at all."
"I've gotten to see the commercials that they did on you. And I've gotten to see some of the most vicious commercials I've ever seen of Michelle Obama talking about you, Hillary."

Says Sidney Blumenthal wrote that the Benghazi attack was "almost certainly preventable. Clinton was in charge of the State Department, and it failed to protect U.S. personnel and an American consulate in Libya."
Says "Hillary Clinton set aside environmental and labor rules to help a South Korean company with a record of violating workers’ rights set up what amounts to a sweatshop in Haiti."
Says Hillary Clinton "viciously" attacked women abused by Bill Clinton.
"ICE just endorsed me."
Says after Hillary Clinton helped a man accused of raping a 12-year-old, "she's seen laughing on two separate occasions, laughing at the girl who was raped."
Says a tweet he sent out "wasn’t saying, ‘check out a sex tape.’ It was just ‘take a look at" the background of Alicia Machado.
"These are radical Islamic terrorists, and (Hillary Clinton) won't even mention the word."
Says Hillary Clinton "wants to go to a single-payer plan" for health care
Says he has "a fiduciary responsibility to his business, his family and his employees to pay no more tax than legally required."
Says Donald Trump "hasn’t broken his promise" to release his tax returns.
Donald Trump would "engage in a risky scheme to privatize Social Security."
Says "no, you’re wrong," responding to the assertion that stop-and-frisk was ruled unconstitutional in New York.
Says to Hillary Clinton, "You heard what I said about (the Trans-Pacific Partnership trade deal), and all of a sudden you were against it."
"NATO is opening up a major terror division. ... I'm sure I'm not going to get credit for it, but that was largely because of what I was saying and my criticism of NATO."

Says "Hillary Clinton's plan would bring in 620,000 refugees in her first term, alone, with no effective way to screen or vet them. Her plan would cost $400 billion in terms of lifetime welfare and entitlement costs."
In New York City, "murders are up."
Says Hillary Clinton’s energy agenda "will cost the U.S. economy over $5 trillion"
Says top Clinton advisers "were pressing" birther movement stories "very hard."
"The only years that anybody's ever seen" of Donald Trump’s tax returns "showed he didn't pay any federal income tax."
"I did not support the war in Iraq … The record shows that I’m right."
"You will learn more about Donald Trump by going down to the Federal Elections" to see the financial disclosure form than by looking at tax returns.
"I did not — I did not — I do not say that. I do not say that" climate change is a hoax perpetrated by the Chinese.
"Our African-American communities are absolutely in the worst shape they've ever been in before. Ever. Ever. Ever."
"I never said" that Muslims would be subject to profiling under his policies.
"I finished" the controversy about where President Barack Obama was born.
"Hillary Clinton and her campaign of 2008 started the birther controversy."
On whether Barack Obama was born in the United States.
"My opponent has no child care plan."
Says the Donald J.Trump Foundation's money "is his money."
"Our veterans, in many cases, are being treated worse than illegal immigrants."
Says Russian President Vladimir Putin "calls me brilliant."
Says Donald Trump supports "an agenda out there" to privatize the Veterans Affairs health care system.
Says Hillary Clinton said the Veterans Affairs scandal is "over-exaggerated." "She said she was satisfied with what was going on."
"I was totally against the war in Iraq."
"I released the most extensive financial review of anybody in the history of politics. … You don't learn much in a tax return."
Says "Hillary Clinton has pledged amnesty in her first 100 days, and her plan will provide Obamacare, Social Security, and Medicare for illegal immigrants, breaking the federal budget."
The number of illegal immigrants "could be 3 million. It could be 30 million."
"Illegal immigration costs our country more than $113 billion a year."
"Inner-city crime is reaching record levels."
"They were going to build the wall a while ago, not so long ago, like in '06. And they couldn't get environmental impact statements."
Says Hillary Clinton "wants to raise taxes on African-American owned businesses to as much as nearly 50 percent more than they're paying now."
The Hollywood celebrities endorsing Hillary Clinton are "in many cases celebrities that aren’t very hot anymore."

"Since President Obama came into office, another 2 million Hispanics have joined the ranks of those in poverty. … The number of Hispanic children living in poverty increased by 15 percent in that short period of time."
Says Hillary Clinton wants illegal immigrants "collecting Social Security benefits."
The Obama administration gave Iran "$400 million in ransom payment cash."
Says a CNN anchor said that Hillary Clinton has gotten "a free ride so far from the media. We're the biggest ones supporting her campaign."
Says a CNN anchor said that Hillary Clinton has gotten "a free ride so far from the media. We're the biggest ones supporting her campaign."
Says military commanders have said that if Donald Trump were elected, "they would not follow his orders."

"I had previously said that NATO was obsolete because it failed to deal adequately with terrorism. Since my comments, they have changed their policy and now have a new division focused on terror threats."
Says the U.S. election system is "rigged."
Says Barack Obama "founded ISIS. I would say the co-founder would be crooked Hillary Clinton."
Says Barack Obama "founded ISIS. I would say the co-founder would be crooked Hillary Clinton."
Says Hillary Clinton's plan "would tax many small businesses by almost 50 percent."
"The Obama-Clinton war on coal has cost Michigan over 50,000 jobs."
"The Obama-Clinton war on coal has cost Michigan over 50,000 jobs."
Says he saw videotape "of the people taking the money off the plane" to pay ransom to Iran for hostages.
"Hillary Clinton says she wants to, ‘raise taxes on the middle class.’ "
"Youth unemployment is through the roof."
Says Donald Trump "is going to go out and carpet bomb" the Middle East.
"As usual, Hillary & the Dems are trying to rig the debates so 2 are up against major NFL games."
On whether he’s had a relationship with Vladimir Putin.
On whether the federal government should set a minimum wage
Says when an interviewer asked Donald Trump if he treats women with respect, Trump replied, "I can't say that."
Says "Donald Trump is a guy who has called for privatization" of the Veterans Administration.
"An analysis showed that Bernie Sanders would have won the Democratic nomination if it were not for the Super Delegates."
"America is one of the highest-taxed nations in the world."
Says Hillary Clinton "wants to essentially abolish the Second Amendment."
Says as GOP was picking a convention city, "I recommended Ohio."
"Just look at what the FBI director said about her (Hillary Clinton) — her misconduct  is a disgrace and embarrassment to our country."
"You know what (Saddam Hussein) did well? He killed terrorists."
"As Secretary of State, Hillary Clinton laundered money to Bill Clinton through Laureate Education, while Bill Clinton was an honorary chairman of the group."
"As Secretary of State, Hillary Clinton laundered money to Bill Clinton through Laureate Education, while Bill Clinton was an honorary chairman of the group."

Says Hillary Clinton’s State Department "approved the transfer of 20 percent of America’s uranium holdings to Russia, while nine investors in the deal funneled $145 million to the Clinton Foundation."
"Hillary Clinton surged the trade deficit with China 40% as Secretary of State, costing Americans millions of jobs."
Says Hillary Clinton "filibustered legislation to reform" Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.
"We don't know anything about Hillary in terms of religion. Now, she's been in the public eye for years and years, and yet there's no — there's nothing out there."
Says Hillary Clinton "has even deleted this record of total support (for the Trans-Pacific Partnership trade agreement) from her book."
The Benghazi victims were "left helpless to die as Hillary Clinton soundly slept in her bed."
"For the amount of money Hillary Clinton would like to spend on refugees, we could rebuild every inner city in America."
"I was among the earliest to criticize the rush to war (in Iraq), and yes, even before the war ever started."
Says delegates can't "legally" change the Republican National Convention rules to prevent Donald Trump’s nomination.
"The Obama administration was actively supporting Al Qaeda in Iraq, the terrorist group that became the Islamic State."
"The Obama administration was actively supporting Al Qaeda in Iraq, the terrorist group that became the Islamic State."
There is "no system to vet" refugees from the Middle East.
"Crime is rising."
Says Judge Gonzalo Curiel "is a member of a club or society, very strongly pro-Mexican."
Says Hillary Clinton has spoken "such lies about my foreign policy. They said I want Japan to … get nuclear weapons. Give me a break."
"I wanted to keep it private, because I don't think it's anybody's business if I want to send money to the vets."
In California, "the windmills are killing hundreds and hundreds of eagles."
It "is Hillary Clinton's agenda" to "release the violent criminals from jail. She wants them all released."
"There are places in America that are among the most dangerous in the world. You go to places like Oakland. Or Ferguson. The crime numbers are worse. Seriously."

"Look, we are at war with these people and they don't wear uniforms. … This is a war against people that are vicious, violent people, that we have no idea who they are, where they come from. We are allowing tens of thousands of them into our country now."
"The only two (Donald Trump tax returns) we have show that he hasn't paid a penny in taxes."
Says "Elizabeth Warren lied when she says I want to abolish the Federal Minimum Wage."
Says Donald Trump said of women, "And you can tell them to go f--- themselves."
Says Hillary Clinton "wants to abolish the Second Amendment."
Germany "is crime-riddled right now" because of migration to Europe.
"You have to be a citizen to vote," but with same-day voter registration, "you have places where people just walk in and vote."
"We're the highest taxed nation in the world."
Says Ted Cruz’s father "was with Lee Harvey Oswald" before the assassination of President John F. Kennedy.
"Frankly, (Hillary Clinton) doesn’t do very well with women."
"ISIS is making millions of dollars a week selling Libyan oil."
"I was totally against the war in Iraq, saying for many years that it would destabilize the Middle East."
Says Donald Trump thinks "a grown man pretending to be a woman (should) be allowed to use the women's restroom."
Says professional football coach Rex Ryan "won championships in New York. The AFC, I think, twice."
"My numbers are better right now than Ronald Reagan's numbers were with Jimmy Carter."
Says Ted Cruz distributed the ad showing a nude Melania Trump on a rug.
Says that when Michelle Fields "found out that there was a security camera, and that they had her on tape, all of a sudden that story changed."
"There’s a tremendous tax that we pay when we (American businesses) go into China, whereas when China sells to us there’s no tax."
"When those restrictions expire (in the Iran nuclear deal), Iran will have an industrial-size military nuclear capability ready to go."
Says Donald Trump promised "to take care of everybody (through government-run healthcare and) the government's going to pay for it."
Under the Iran nuclear deal, "we give them $150 billion, we get nothing."
Says the man who rushed the stage at him in Dayton, Ohio, "had chatter about ISIS, or with ISIS" in his social media posts.
"GDP was zero essentially for the last two quarters."
Common Core is "education through Washington D.C."
Says Donald Trump said the government is going to pay for everybody to have health care.
On Donald Trump's track record in business
The wives of the 9/11 hijackers "knew exactly what was happening" and went back to Saudi Arabia two days before the attacks to watch their husbands on television flying the planes.
Says Mahatma Gandhi once said, "First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win."
"I don't know anything about David Duke."
Says "Harry Reid, when asked about the Republican field, said the Republican he likes the best is Donald Trump, and he said, because I can work with him. He'll cut deals."
Says "the New York Times can write a story that they know is false" yet "they can't basically be sued."
"We (Trump University) have an ‘A’ from the Better Business Bureau."
Says Ted Cruz "said I was in favor in Libya. I never discussed that subject."
"If it weren’t for me … (illegal immigration) wouldn’t even be a big subject."

Says that in the Philippines more than a century ago, Gen. John Pershing "took 50 bullets, and he dipped them in pigs’ blood," and shot 49 Muslim rebels. "The 50th person, he said, ‘You go back to your people, and you tell them what happened.’ And for 25 years, there wasn’t a problem."
With Obamacare, "You have no options .. you can't get competitive bidding."
On the Iraq war, "I said it loud and clear, 'You'll destabilize the Middle East.' "
"Don't believe those phony numbers when you hear 4.9 and 5 percent unemployment. The number's probably 28, 29, as high as 35. In fact, I even heard recently 42 percent."
"Right now we’re the highest taxed country in the world."
Regarding the Iraq War, "I was the one that said, ‘Don’t go, don’t do it, you’re going to destabilize the Middle East.’ "
"Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders have the identical position on health care, which is they want to put the government in charge of you and your doctor."
"I never once asked that (Megyn Kelly) be removed" as a debate moderator.
China has "total control, just about, of North Korea."
Among Syrian refugees and migrants coming into Europe, "there look like very few women. Very few children."
"We get practically nothing compared to the cost of" keeping U.S. military forces in South Korea.
The five Guantanamo detainees swapped for Bowe Bergdahl are "back on the battlefield."
A Trump television ad shows Mexicans swarming over "our southern border."
ISIS is "going to people showing videos of Donald Trump insulting Islam and Muslims in order to recruit more radical jihadists."

The 9/11 terrorists' friends, family, girlfriends in the United States "were sent back for the most part to Saudi Arabia. They knew what was going on. They went home, and they wanted to watch their boyfriends on television."
"We're practically not allowed to use coal any more. What do we do with our coal? We ship it to China and they spew it in the air."
Says 25 percent of U.S. Muslims "agreed that violence against Americans here in the United States is justified as a part of the global jihad."
Says crime statistics show blacks kill 81 percent of white homicide victims.
"I watched in Jersey City, N.J., where thousands and thousands of people were cheering" as the World Trade Center collapsed.
The federal government is sending refugees to states with governors who are "Republicans, not to the Democrats."
The Trans-Pacific Partnership "was designed for China to come in, as they always do, through the back door and totally take advantage of everyone."
"We’re losing now over $500 billion a year in terms of imbalance with China."
Says his plan would cut taxes without increasing the deficit.
The CNBC debate was supposed to be three hours, and he "renegotiated it down to two hours."
Says Ohio Gov. John Kasich "got lucky with a thing called fracking," which "is why Ohio is doing well."
